name: words-and-hyphens
description: Extracts unique words and hyphens from text stripping punctuation on the way.
author: Boris Diakur <contact@borisdiakur.com> (https://github.com/borisdiakur)

scripts.istanbul: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html && open coverage/words-and-hyphens/index.js.html
scripts.coveralls: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

keywords: unique, words, hyphens, extract, hyphenate, strip, punctuation
